Meanwhile, the average number of citations per item of the Dental Materials Journal was 60.74, which was significantly higher than that of other journals (Fig. 8A).
Through Bradford's Law, the core journals in this field were JPD, Journal of Endodontics, International Endodontic Journal, Journal of Adhesive Dentistry, and Operative Dentistry (Fig. 8B).

The number of papers published by JPD began to increase significantly in 1990, and the number of papers published by the Journal of Adhesive Dentistry began to increase significantly in 2005 (Fig. 8C).

Fig. 7 also illustrates that four Italian scholars form the largest author collaboration network among the top 10 authors globally in this field.
